p: Funahashi et al. examined an association of CpG island methylation level in the Î±-synuclein gene with DLB [ 50]. The authors found that intron 1 methylation in leucocytes is significantly reduced in DLB patients compared to controls. Similar results indicating a reduction in DNA methylation in DLB patients were described by Desplats (2011) [ 44]. These authors found that hypomethylation is associated with the translocation of DNMT1 from the nucleus to the cytoplasm, similar to the findings described in PD patients [ 44]. Thus, similar epigenetic dysregulation occurs in DLB and PD.
